titleStmt.title: XXVI sermons. The third volume preached by that learned and reverend divine John Donne ...
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Newcomb and are to be sold at the several book-sellers-shops ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages faded and torn, with print show-through and slight loss of print; pages 121-128 and 393-396 lacking. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
